item.title: My failed LSB steganography algorithm
item.description: Last month (December 2014), I started developing a new GUI steganography software after building a simple steganography tool for my post at Infosec Institue. The simple tool (stegman) used a really simple approach that can be thought of and implemented by anyone in few minutes. {% image failed-stego.jpg class=“head-image” alt=“stego girl” %}
